120.title: ADVENTURE STORY COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC. Freddy Lombard.
120.author: [No author]

contents.title: The Will of Godfrey of Bouillon

notes: "Collects the influential work of one of Europe's most acclaimed cartoonists, Yves Chaland. Join lowlife Freddy Lombard and his friends Sweep and Dina on their incredible international adventures. Masquerading as a philanthropist, Freddy sponges off his uncle as he wanders the globe, and gets his crew into trouble."
